artist: Designer: Charles G. Shepard; Designer: Peter Adams; Manufacturer: Shepard Hardware Company
description: Uncle Sam wearing blue jacket with red pin striped pants and tall hat, holding green umbrella in left hand and standing on green and orange rectangular box; brown bag below his right hand on box
inscription:
Inscriptions and Sticker

on bag, on PL side, inscriped: [U.S.]; on bottom, on PR side, on box, engraved: [PAT JUNE 8 _ 1886]
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [#280-14 3 (circled) / X \"Uncle Sam Bank\" / 74184B 275 / 4320 / #231M]
title: "Uncle Sam" mechanical bank
